channel.title: Wanting to start a server read on if your good at coding
channel.description: Title say's it all i'm offering one lucky person to pretty much code for me I'll keep it nice and short , what do you have to do ? - client coding , website coding , server coding so everything what Do I Do ? - I pay for everything once you code can you complain cause you do everything and try and take my players? no that will not be accepted we are partners till the end . skype cameron.wong5 note another thing I do not want someone who is new coding I want it to be big i'll put the money into it but I want result's this is ideal for someone who is talented but broke I don't want some wannabe that thinks he's all good then he get's stuck and quit's If you can't do something most big server's can then don't bother adding my skype you must be all round good at everything forums website client coding and programming not sure what base im going to use yet whether i want old style or new style that will be one of your job's aswell.

item.title: Wanting to start a server read on if your good at coding
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.source: Wanting to start a server read on if your good at coding

item.title: Wanting to start a server read on if your good at coding
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:5, topic:464698”][quote author=Pink Phat link=topic=568786.msg4128157#msg4128157 date=1350743167]
Expecting to find just one person who is excellent in web development and server/client development is stupid.
[/quote]

I fit that mostly, however, I’m not dumb enough to actually do this.[/quote]
Yeah, there are obviously people out there who are good in all of those aspects but to expect them to do so much work is absurd.

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to start a server read on if your good at coding

item.title: Wanting to start a server read on if your good at coding
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

If you’re just a basic coder, don’t host a server? Learn more Java (Not from just RSPS’s) before you start. You’re basically jumping the gun. And stop posting this everywhere!

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to start a server read on if your good at coding

item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:6, topic:464698”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=568786.msg4128504#msg4128504 date=1350776707]

Expecting to find just one person who is excellent in web development and server/client development is stupid.

I fit that mostly, however, I’m not dumb enough to actually do this.
[/quote]

Your sig says otherwise[/quote]

Yes, however that part of my sig is fairly old, and I can manage programming an RSPS.

item.description:
@Mills610 wrote:

No offence guys but this is no different to buying a source I’m just asking for a coder witch is not out of the ordinary I can code but don’t expect much because I’m a basic coder

Read full topic
